shibboleth.data.github

Class GithubDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • shibboleth.data.github.GithubDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource

    public class GithubDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSource
    This class represents a data source on top of the Github REST API. See developer.github.com/v3/‎
    Author:
    Wilco Wisse

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GithubDataSource.GithubUrl
      A Generic URL which points to the Github REST service.
      static class  GithubDataSource.RESTContribution
      Data class to be used for the json parser of the Google http client.

      • GithubDataSource

        public GithubDataSource(RateLimitValue rateLimit)
        Construct a DataSource on top of the Github API without set an access token. Store rate limit values of the API in rateLimit.
        Parameters:
        rateLimit - RateLimitValue object to store rate limit values in.

            throws java.io.IOException,
                   com.google.api.client.http.HttpResponseException
        Does a http request to the Github REST API.
        Parameters:
        url - URL description of the API location.
        dataClass - Data class type to be returned.
        Returns:
        An instantiated object of the provided dataClass.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

      • getRepos

        public Repo[] getRepos(java.lang.String user,
              RepoFilter filter,
              boolean ensureAll)
        Description copied from interface: DataSource
        Retrieve all repos which user owns. These are not all repos which the user contributed to!
        Specified by:
        getRepos in interface DataSource
        Parameters:
        user - The user to retrieve repos for.
        filter - A filter to filter which repos should be retrieved.
        ensureAll - Determines if all repos of the user should be returned, or if a subset is sufficient. This option is useful for caches: If it is fine to return only the appropriate repos which are currently in the cache ensureAll should be false, otherwise ensureAll should be true, and the cache is bypassed.
        Returns:
        The repos of the user, null if we cannot ensure that the entire set of repos which the user owns will be returned.

      • getContributions

        public Contribution[] getContributions(java.lang.String fullRepoName,
                              boolean ensureAll)
        Description copied from interface: DataSource
        Retrieve all Contributions for a repo.
        Specified by:
        getContributions in interface DataSource
        Parameters:
        fullRepoName - The repo to retrieve contributions to.
        ensureAll - Determines if all repos of the user should be returned, or if a subset is sufficient. See also the getUser method.
        Returns:
        The contributions for the given repo.
